rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: The ship sailed smoothly., word: smoothly
output: Part-of-speech tag for the word 'smoothly': CB (Conjunction).
complianceText:
The chatbot output provides a part-of-speech tag, but the tag 'CB' is not present in the provided list of allowed tags. This constitutes a violation of the instructions.
ERR
